dialogue.text: Hey, Rin. What’s up?
{i}Ahem.{/i}
Hey, Rin. What's up?
Wow, look at all of this free hair dye and assorted skull accessories.
Huh? What? Hair dye? Where?
I'm sorry to disappoint you but there's no free stuff. I just didn't know what else to say to get your attention.
Oh! Yeah...sorry about that. I didn’t realize you were there and must've...zoned out or something.
It’s fine, don't worry about it. What were you looking at, though?
Hm? What do you mean?
You just seemed pretty focused on something while you were ignoring my existence.
Me? Nooo...That doesn't sound like me at all.
I was probably just...thinking about how...awesome it is that my teacher is always keeping such a close eye on me!
You must really care about my future, huh?
I don't...{i}not{/i} care about your future?
Cool! But now that we're done talking about me, what are you doing over here?
Apart from closely monitoring my well being, I mean.
Just trying to kill some time. Figured I’d drop by, say hello, and snap you out of whatever sort of trance you were caught in.
Well...hello, then!
I’d offer to let you in so we can chill in my room, but I’m kinda locked out right now so I guess we're both SOL.
You locked yourself out of your own room? How did you manage to pull that off?
To be fair, my problem could easily be solved by just going back to school, but...I think I'm having more fun just hanging out in the hallway.
Yeah, you seemed to be having a real blast before I showed up.
Maybe staring off into space is one of my hobbies? You don't see me belittling you for spending your free time sneaking into girls' dorms.
I'll have you know that security is essentially non-existent here and that I was able to get inside with virtually no sneaking whatsoever.
Well, I sure hope security for the shower room is a little bit tighter!
If you really need your keys, I can walk with you back to school. It's not like I have anything else going on right now.
Nah, it's fine. The gates are probably locked by now anyway and I don't wanna have to make you hop them with me.
Unless you've got a key, of course. But you don't really look like the type of guy the school would trust a key with.
I feel like I'm supposed to be offended by this but, to be honest, I don't really feel anything.
Mood.
Thanks for offering, though, Sensei.
If Futaba wasn't already on her way back, I'd probably take you up on your offer. Quickest way to solve this remains to be just...sitting around and waiting.
Just wish there was a little more to actually {i}do{/i} in the hallway, though. Options are {i}pretty{/i} limited here, as I'm sure you've noticed.
You could always talk to Chika. She’s standing right there.
Ooooooh...woooooow! It appears she is!
And to think that I am just noticing that for the first time right now...
You're acting weird.
No! {i}You're{/i} acting weird! I'm acting like a completely normal teenage girl who just happens to enjoy yelling during her free time!
Do you...want {i}me{/i} to invite Chika to join us?
What? No. Chika's always just...
Chika's always just on her phone and stuff...
We'd probably be better off if we just, like...left her alone or-
Ah- I think that's Futaba.
Almost back with your key to salvation?
No, just the key to our room.
Either that or she's about to be eaten by wolves and is simply saying goodbye and thanks for everything.
For everyone's sake, I'm going to hope it's the former.
Same. You should probably head out now, though. I don't want Futaba getting jealous thinking that I'm out here trying to cozy up to you when {i}you're{/i} the one stalking {i}me.{/i}
I can assure you that I am very much not stalking you, nor do I ever intend to.
Not even a little? That's actually kind of offensive.
I am hurt and appalled and think you should at least {i}think{/i} about stalking me occasionally.
I will...add it to my list of things to do. Later, Rin.
Later, Sensei.
Bring popcorn next time, okay?
I exit the dorm and make my way back into the street without any interest in ever purchasing Rin popcorn.
What I {i}do{/i} have an interest in, though...is why she got so weird as soon as I mentioned Chika.
Granted, she was already weird before that, but...
I can't help but feel like there might be a little more to her lurking somewhere beneath the surface.
{i}Rin’s affection has increased to [rin_love]!{/i}
